languages.text: "А ты не ведаешь? Не удивлен, брат Ульфар не жалует это прозвание. Все повелось с первых лет его в Ордене. Ульфар дольше прочих проходил испытание Чашей Вульфена, и рунные жрецы успели счесть его пропавшим и мертвым. После в набегах не раз получал он тяжкие раны, что надолго отправляли его в объятия стазис-сна. Как ни заявишься к Зловещему вою в гости, спросишь: "Где же брат Ульфар?" А он почивает. А недавно он и вовсе... потерялся, пропал после налета на ксеносов". {n}В насмешливой улыбке сверкают длинные клыки.{/n}

"You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А ты не ведаешь? Не удивлен, брат Ульфар не жалует это прозвание. Все повелось с первых лет его в Ордене. Ульфар дольше прочих проходил испытание Чашей Вульфена, и рунные жрецы успели счесть его пропавшим и мертвым. После в набегах не раз получал он тяжкие раны, что надолго отправляли его в объятия стазис-сна. Как ни заявишься к Зловещему вою в гости, спросишь: "Где же брат Ульфар?" А он почивает. traits.locale_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the order. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the rune priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Famehungry, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

languages.text: “你不知道吗？我并不惊讶，因为我们的乌尔法兄弟并不喜欢这个称呼。他刚加入战团不久，就得到了这个称号。当时，乌尔法接受了狼人之杯的试炼。他花的时间比其他人要长得多，甚至连符文牧师都放弃了他。后来，他在一场战斗中受了重伤，很长一段时间内都不省人事。每次我们拜访怒嚎者的时候，都会顺道问一句‘乌尔法兄弟在哪儿？’而他每次都是在躺着。不久之前，他彻底失踪了……和异形的战斗结束之后，他就不知迷途到什么地方去了。”{n}索巴德露出了嘲讽的笑容，长长的狼牙泛着凶光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你不知道吗？我并不惊讶，因为我们的乌尔法兄弟并不喜欢这个称呼。他刚加入战团不久，就得到了这个称号。当时，乌尔法接受了狼人之杯的试炼。他花的时间比其他人要长得多，甚至连符文牧师都放弃了他。后来，他在一场战斗中受了重伤，很长一段时间内都不省人事。每次我们拜访渴名者的时候，都会顺道问一句‘乌尔法兄弟在哪儿？’而他每次都是在躺着。不久之前，他彻底失踪了……和异形的战斗结束之后，他就不知迷途到什么地方去了。”{n}索巴德露出了嘲讽的笑容，长长的狼牙泛着凶光。{/n}

languages.text: 「知らないのか？ブラザー・ウルファーが異名を気にしなくても驚きはしないが。こいつは戦団の新入りの頃から、仲間内ではそう呼ばれてる。こいつは狂狼の盃の試練で他の奴らより時間がかかったもんだから、ルーンプリーストに死んだものだと思われたんだよ。その後、襲撃で瀕死の傷を負ったウルファーはしばらく植物状態になった。破滅の咆哮のところに行っては、『ブラザー・ウルファーはどこだ？』って聞いたもんさ。いっつも休んでたんだよな。つい先日は煙のようにいなくなっちまった…異種族の襲撃を受けてから行方知れずだったんだ」{n}トールバルドがからかうように満面の笑みを見せると、長い犬歯がキラリと光る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「知らないのか？ブラザー・ウルファーが異名を気にしなくても驚きはしないが。こいつは新人のころから、仲間内ではそう呼ばれてる。こいつは狂狼の盃の試練で他の奴らより時間がかかったもんだから、ルーンプリーストに死んだものだと思われたんだよ。その後、襲撃で瀕死の傷を負ったウルファーはしばらく植物状態になった。誉れある飢えのところに行っては、『ブラザー・ウルファーはどこだ？』って聞いたもんさ。いっつも休んでたんだよな。つい先日は煙のようにいなくなっちまった…異種族の襲撃を受けてから行方知れずだったんだ」{n}トールバルトがからかうように満面の笑みを見せると、長い犬歯がキラリと光る。{/n}

languages.text: «¿No lo sabía? Poco me sorprende; al hermano Ulfar no le agrada ese apodo. Se le ha llamado así desde que empezó en el Capítulo. Cuando Ulfar se sometió a la prueba de la Copa del Wulfen, tardó tanto que los Sacerdotes Rúnicos lo dieron por perdido. Más adelante, recibía tales heridas en sus incursiones que una vez se pasó una buena temporada en estasis. Cuando íbamos a visitar al Aullido Torvo, preguntábamos dónde estaba el hermano Ulfar y siempre nos respondían que descansando. Bueno, y hace poco no había quien lo encontrara... después de que se perdiera en una ofensiva contra unos xenos». {n}Thorbald sonríe burlonamente, con sus colmillos largos a la vista.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿No lo sabía? Poco me sorprende; al hermano Ulfar no le agrada ese apodo. Se le ha llamado así desde que empezó en el Capítulo. Cuando Ulfar se sometió a la prueba de la Copa del Wulfen, tardó tanto que los Sacerdotes Rúnicos lo dieron por perdido. Más adelante, recibía tales heridas en sus incursiones que una vez se pasó una buena temporada en estasis. Cuando íbamos a visitar al Aullido Torvo, preguntábamos dónde estaba el hermano Ulfar y siempre nos respondían que descansando. Bueno, y hace poco no había quien lo encontrara... después de que se perdiera en una ofensiva contra unos xenos». {n}Thorbald sonríe burlonamente, con sus colmillos largos a la vista.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous l'ignorez ? Ça ne m'étonne guère, frère Ulfar n'aime pas ce surnom. Il le porte depuis ses premières années au sein du Chapitre. Ulfar s'est montré si lent par rapport aux autres lors de l'épreuve de la Coupe du Wulfen que les prêtres des runes l'ont déclaré perdu. Il a ensuite été gravement blessé lors d'un raid, au point que les guérisseurs ont dû le placer en état de stase pendant une longue période. Chaque fois que nous rendions visite aux Hurleurs sanguinaires, nous leur demandions où était frère Ulfar et on nous répondait toujours qu'il se reposait. Récemment, il a tout bonnement disparu après une attaque contre des xénos. » {n}Thorbald sourit d'un air moqueur en montrant ses longs crocs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'ignorez ? Ça ne m'étonne guère, frère Ulfar n'aime pas ce surnom. Il le porte depuis ses premières années au sein de l'ordre. Ulfar s'est montré si lent par rapport aux autres lors de l'épreuve de la Coupe du Wulfen que les prêtres des runes l'ont déclaré perdu. Il a ensuite été gravement blessé lors d'un raid, au point que les guérisseurs ont dû le placer en état de stase pendant une longue période. Chaque fois que nous rendions visite aux Dévoreurs de gloire, nous leur demandions où était frère Ulfar et on nous répondait toujours qu'il se reposait. Récemment, il a tout bonnement disparu après une attaque contre des xénos. » {n}Thorbald sourit d'un air moqueur en montrant ses longs crocs.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr wisst es nicht? Das wundert mich nicht, Bruder Ulfar schätzt den Namen nicht. Er trägt ihn schon seit seinen frühen Jahren im Orden. Als Ulfar seine Prüfung des Bechers der Wulfen ablegte, brauchte er so viel länger dafür als die anderen, dass die Runenpriester ihn als verloren aufgaben. Später wurde er in Überfällen schwer verwundet und fiel in einen langen Stasis-Schlaf. Jedes Mal, wenn wir Baleful Howl besuchten, fragten wir: 'Wo ist Bruder Ulfar?' Und immer war er gerade dabei, sich auszuruhen. Und vor kurzem verschwand er dann vollends ... verschollen nach einem Angriff auf Xenos." {n}Thorbald grinst spöttisch. Seine langen Reißzähne glitzern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das wisst Ihr nicht? Das überrascht mich nicht, Ulfar mag den Spitznamen nicht sonderlich. Er trägt ihn schon seit seinen ersten Jahren im Orden. Als Ulfar seine Prüfung vom Becher der Wulfen ablegte, brauchte er so viel länger als alle anderen, dass die Runenpriester ihn schon verloren glaubten. Später erhielt er bei Überfällen so schwere Wunden, dass er für lange Zeit in Staseschlaf versetzt werden musste. Immer wenn wir den Famehungry einen Besuch abstatteten, fragten wir: 'Wo ist Bruder Ulfar?' Und jedes Mal erholte er sich von einer Niederlage. Und kürzlich verschwand er dann komplett ... nach einem gescheiterten Angriff auf Xenos." {n}Thorbald grinst spöttisch, und seine langen Fangzähne funkeln.{/n}

languages.text: "Bilmiyor musun? Şaşırmadım. Kardeş Ulfar, lakapları pek umursamaz. Tümen'deki ilk yıllarından beri böyle anılır. Ulfar'ın Börü Kadehi imtihanı, diğerlerininkine göre o kadar uzun sürdü ki Rün Rahipleri bir ara ondan ümidi kesmişti. Daha sonra baskınlarda uzun bir süre staz uykusunda kalmasına sebep olan ağır yaralar aldı. Ne zaman Uğursuz Uluma'nın yanına uğrasak 'Kardeş Ulfar nerede?' diye sorardık. Her zaman da dinleniyor olurdu. Bir süre önce de bir zeno saldırısı sonrasında hepten ortadan kayboldu." {n}Alaycı bir şekilde sırıtan Thorbald'ın uzun dişleri parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You do not know? I'm not surprised, Brother Ulfar does not care for the moniker. He has had it since his early years in the Chapter. When Ulfar underwent his trial of the Cup of Wulfen, he took so much longer than the others that the Rune Priests gave him up for lost. Later, he received grievous wounds in raids that sent him into stasis sleep for a long time. Any time we would pay a visit to the Baleful Howl, we would ask, 'Where is Brother Ulfar?' And he was always resting. And recently, he went missing altogether... lost after an attack on xenos." {n}Thorbald grins mockingly, his long fangs glinting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyor musun? Şaşırmadım. Kardeşim Ulfar lakapları pek umursamaz. Tümen'deki ilk yıllarından beri böyle anılır. Ulfar'ın Börü Kadehi imtihanı diğerlerine göre o kadar uzun sürdü ki rün rahipleri onu kaybetmiş saydı. Daha sonra baskınlarda uzun bir süre staz uykusunda kalmasına yol açan acılı yaralar aldı. Uğursuz Uluma'nın yanına ne zaman gitsek 'Kardeş Ulfar nerede?' diye sorardık. Her zaman da dinleniyor olurdu. Yakın zamanlarda bir zeno saldırısından sonra hepten ortadan kayboldu." {n}Thorbald alaycı bir şekilde gülümsüyor, uzun dişleri parıldıyor.{/n}

"Bilmiyor musun? Şaşırmadım. Kardeşim Ulfar lakapları pek umursamaz. Tümen'deki ilk yıllarından beri böyle anılır. Ulfar'ın Börü Kadehi imtihanı diğerlerine göre o kadar uzun sürdü ki rün rahipleri onu kaybetmiş saydı. Daha sonra baskınlarda uzun bir süre staz uykusunda kalmasına yol açan acılı yaralar aldı. Uğursuz Uluma'nın yanına ne zaman gitsek 'Kardeş Ulfar nerede?' diye sorardık. Her zaman da dinleniyor olurdu. Yakın zamanlarda bir zeno saldırısından sonra hepten ortadan kayboldu." {n}Thorbald alaycı bir şekilde gülümsüyor, uzun dişleri parıldıyor.{/n}
